import sys

N, T = map(int, input().rstrip().split())
t = list(map(int, input().rstrip().split()))

total = T
start_time = 0

for i in range(N):
    if t[i] < start_time:
        total += T - start_time + t[i]
    else:
        total += T
    start_time = t[i]

print(total)

import sys

N, T = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())

# 1.
x = 0
for i in range(N):
    t = int(sys.stdin.readline())
    x = max(x, t)
print(x + T)

# 2.
t = [0] * N
for i in range(N):
    t[i] = int(sys.stdin.readline())
print(max(t) + T)
import sys

N, T = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().rstrip().split())  # N: # of stops, T: time limit
t = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().rstrip().split()))  # t[i]: time when the i-th stop is reached

total = 0  # total time
start = 0  # time when the bus starts

for i in range(N):
    if t[i] < start:  # if the bus arrives before the next stop
        total += T
    else:  # if the bus arrives after the next stop
        total += T + t[i] - start
        start = t[i]

print(total)

import sys

N, T = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().rstrip().split())
t = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().rstrip().split()))

total = 0
start = 0

for i in range(N):

        total += T
    else:

        start = t[i]

print(total)

import sys

N, T = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().rstrip().split())  # N:個数 T:時間
t = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().rstrip().split()))  # t:時刻

total = 0
start = 0

for i in range(N):  # 各時刻について
    if t[i] < start:
        total += T
    else:
        total += T + t[i] - start
        start = t[i]

print(total)

import sys

N, T = map(int, input().split())
t = list(map(int, input().split()))

total = 0
start = 0

for i in range(N):
    if t[i] < start:
        total += T
    else:
        total += T + t[i] - start
        start = t[i]

print(total)

#!/usr/bin/env python3

import sys

N, T = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())

# 1.
# x = 0
# for i in range(N):
#     t = int(sys.stdin.readline())
#     x = max(x, t)
# print(x + T)

# 2.
t = [0] * N
for i in range(N):
    t[i] = int(sys.stdin.readline())
print(max(t) + T)
